name: 2nd World Nursing and Healthcare Congress (World Nursing-2023)
content: The Organizing Committee of 2nd World Nursing and Healthcare Congress invite you to participate in the nursing congress, which will be held during June 21-22, 2023 at Valencia, Spain. The main theme of conference is “Addressing Current and Future Challenges in Nursing and Healthcare”. This Conference will provide a unique opportunity for nurses, healthcare practitioners, paramedics and trauma care specialists from around the world to communicate and share innovative thoughts and practices designed to optimize patient care.
